```{r,  knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = TRUE)}
library(tidyverse)
download_file <- function(year) {
  link <- glue::glue("https://www.oregon.gov/ode/educator-resources/assessment/v/pagr_schools_ela_raceethnicity_{year-1}{year}.xlsx")
  rio::import(link, setclass = "tibble", na = c("-", "--", "*"))
}

download_file(15)


```
